b: when told invenscan then play metallic beep, become next in 0.1s
when told invenclose then play metallic robot perc beep, become next in 0.1s
when told by body inventory opened left then become untweened next
when told by body inventory opened right then become untweened next
when starts then stop all parts face view, tell invenclose
when starts then all parts face view, tell invenscan
when told by body inventory closed left then become untweened next
when told by body inventory closed right then become untweened next
